ChapterShortDescription: GDG Bristol is the Google Developer Group for Bristol and the South West of England, a community for anyone interested in Google technologies including Google Cloud Platform, Firebase, Android, Web and TensorFlow. Join us to meet other developers, engineers, SREs and technologists exploring the latest Google technologies.
ChapterLongDec: Google Developer Group Bristol is an official Google GDG chapter, formed in 2018. We are a community for anyone interested in Google technologies including Google Cloud Platform, Firebase, Android, Web and TensorFlow. Join us to meet other developers, engineers, SREs and technologists exploring the latest Google technologies. Our meetups will be show-and-tells and Q-and-As designed for anybody who wants to get their hands on any Google technology. If you can sponsor a venue or provide an interesting talk please get in touch!
aboutGDGProgram: GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter and can host a variety of technical activities for developers - from just a few people getting together to watch our latest videos, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to hackathons.
